headline: WEC Energy Beats Q4 Earnings Estimates, to Add More Renewable Assets
summary: WEC tops Q4 earnings and revenue estimates, lifts 2025 profits and outlines billions in planned investments to expand renewable generation.

headline: A Look At Edison International (EIX) Valuation After Earnings Beats And Wildfire Securitization Progress
summary: Recent attention on Edison International (EIX) has centered on its recent earnings outperformance and progress on wildfire cost securitization, as investors weigh how these developments might affect debt levels and future wildfire related risk. See our latest analysis for Edison International. The recent focus on securitizing Woolsey fire costs and improving the balance sheet has come alongside stronger sentiment in the stock. The 90 day share price return is 11.69% and the 1 year total...

headline: Duke Energy to Release Q4 Earnings: How to Approach the Stock Now?
summary: DUK prepares to report Q4 results, with earnings expected to fall 9% year over year, even as revenue growth and power demand show resilience.

raw.headline: Duke Energy to Release Q4 Earnings: How to Approach the Stock Now?

headline: Edison International Wildfire Securitization Reshapes Risk Profile And Valuation
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) has filed to securitize $1.951b in wildfire related expenses. The transaction is intended to shift qualified wildfire costs into a dedicated financing structure. California policymakers are preparing wildfire mitigation policy reforms expected later this year. These developments could affect Edison International’s risk profile and capital structure once implemented. Edison International, trading at $63.71, has seen its share price up 2.5% over the past week...
